summary: This document is an email chain from January 15, 2025, containing a civilian report forwarded by an Assistant United States Attorney to a case team. The report details allegations from a former employee of Wests Mogadore Country Club in Ohio, who claims to have encountered Jeffrey Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, and others there between 2002-2004, and separately alleges disturbing encounters with celebrities Marshall Mathers (Eminem) and Marilyn Manson, as well as a mention of P Diddy.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Forwards a civilian report to a case team regarding allegations related to Epstein/Maxwell, consistent with established practice.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Allegedly visited Wests Mogadore Country Club with Ghislaine Maxwell and others between 2002-2004.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Allegedly visited Wests Mogadore Country Club with Jeffrey Epstein and others between 2002-2004.

persons.name: Marshall Mathers
persons.context: Allegedly visited Wests Mogadore Country Club on a separate occasion; the witness was forced to pour him a drink and flirt, but she does not know if he had sex with her.

persons.name: Marilyn Manson
persons.context: Allegedly visited the witness's aunt's house twice when she was a child (around ages 10-11 and 13), engaging in inappropriate behavior; also known as Brian.

persons.name: Eric West
persons.context: Owner/boss of Wests Mogadore Country Club; took over cooking to allow another man to talk to the witness and was involved in pressuring her.

persons.name: P Diddy
persons.context: Mentioned in a hazy memory from around 2010-2011, allegedly taking a video of the witness while she was pregnant in a trailer near Akron, OH.

persons.name: Brian
persons.context: Real name referenced for Marilyn Manson; the witness's father said she would never see Brian again after an incident.

persons.name: Witness's Dad
persons.context: Allowed Marilyn Manson to trace the witness's breasts onto a t-shirt when she was 10-11; later pulled her out of the house after an upsetting incident; refused to discuss events before his death in 2020.

connections.description: Allegedly visited Wests Mogadore Country Club together with others between 2002-2004.
Eric West was the witness's boss at the country club where she worked from 2002-2004.
Eric West took over cooking to allow an unnamed man to talk to and pressure the witness regarding Marshall Mathers.
Marilyn Manson (Brian) visited the witness's aunt's house and interacted with her father, who was initially permissive but later protective.
The witness alleges inappropriate encounters with Marilyn Manson during her childhood, which she describes as feeling like dreams or hypnosis.

events.title: Epstein/Maxwell Visit to Country Club
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell allegedly visited Wests Mogadore Country Club in Ohio. A bed was moved into the banquet space.

events.title: Marshall Mathers Incident at Country Club
events.description: Marshall Mathers (Eminem) visited the country club. The witness was forced to pour him a drink and flirt, was drugged, and later found herself in a different part of the club telling a man that Mathers didn't have sex with her.

events.title: First Marilyn Manson Visit
events.description: When the witness was around 10-11 years old, Marilyn Manson (Brian) visited her aunt's house and, with her father's permission, traced her developing breasts onto a white t-shirt.

events.title: Second Marilyn Manson Visit
events.description: When the witness was around 13, Marilyn Manson visited again with a group of men. After Manson said something that upset her father, he pulled her out and said she'd never see Brian again.

events.title: Alleged P Diddy Encounter
events.description: While pregnant and living in a trailer near Akron, OH, the witness has a hazy memory of someone she thinks is P Diddy taking a video of her with a phone.

events.title: Separate Rape Incident
events.description: The witness was raped by her boyfriend's drug dealer in 2005. She tried to report it, but her boyfriend died and there are no records.

events.title: Death of Witness's Father
events.description: The witness's father passed away in 2020. Prior to his death, he refused to discuss the events she described.

locations: Wests Mogadore Country Club, Mogadore, Ohio (golf course, bar, bowling alley)
keyFacts: A former employee of Wests Mogadore Country Club in Ohio alleges encounters with Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell there between 2002-2004, including a bed being moved into a banquet space.
The witness separately alleges a traumatic incident involving Marshall Mathers (Eminem) at the same country club, where she was drugged and threatened.

The witness provides detailed allegations of inappropriate childhood encounters with Marilyn Manson (real name Brian) at her aunt's house, including an incident where he traced her breasts onto a t-shirt with her father's permission.
The witness describes her memories as feeling unreal, like dreams or hypnosis, and states they have become increasingly overwhelming, affecting her mental health.
The report was forwarded by an Assistant United States Attorney to a case team, indicating it was treated as a potentially relevant civilian report in the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.
